content.title: Regenerate the Fields
content.body:
The Customize List window contains the fields that are available in the form.
You can add a new field, customize an existing field, remove a field, and rearrange the order of the fields.

Once you make the required changes, click Regenerate.


You can view that the changes to the fields are saved, and updated in the canvas.


For more information on Customizing the Data Model Objects, click here.
